# Add Word Position in Sentence
add_word_positions <- function(story) {
  words <- unlist(story[,"word"])
  position <- numeric(nrow(story))
  count <- 0
  row <- 1
  
  for (word in words) {
    count <- count + 1
    position[row] <- count
    row <- row + 1
    if (grepl("\\.", word)) {
      count <- 0 
    }
  }
  
  cbind(position, story)
}
